title: Social Media Handles and Contact Info Extractor

maxDepth.title: Maximum link depth
maxDepth.description: Upper bound on link depth for crawler to traverse.

maxRequests.title: Maximum requests
maxRequests.description: Upper bound on number of pages the crawler will visit per run.

waitForAjax.title: Wait for asynchronous elements
waitForAjax.description: The crawler will wait until all page elements are loaded.

liveView.title: Enable LiveView
liveView.description: Screenshots of pages will be stored when run in cloud.
